Html:
Sorry for the noobish question. I got Microsoft Visual Studio 2010 Ultimate edition installed on the system. If it's not too much of an issue I'd prefer to use existing VS 2010 Ultimate and not have to install Web Developer Express. What's the best way to get prerequisites installed in this case. The documentation lists two different sources:

http://www.microsoft.com/web/gallery/install.aspx?appid=VWD2010SP1Pack

http://www.microsoft.com/web/gallery/install.aspx?appsxml=&appid=VS2010SP1Pack

And then there are links for individually installing prerequisites.

What's the best method for me to setup the pre-reqs?

Thanks

The second link (http://www.microsoft.com/web/gallery/install.aspx?appsxml=&appid=VS2010SP1Pack) should install the right prerequisites for Visual Studio 2010.

On Mon, Feb 13, 2012 at 1:55 PM, chakraps <notifications@codeplex.com> wrote:
